LanguageData.TradingDontcare.label: Don't care
LanguageData.TradingDontcare.description: Trading is just another tool for survival.
LanguageData.TradingHonored.label: Honored
LanguageData.TradingHonored.description: The art of trading is second to none. We ought to trade as often as we can.

LanguageData.TradingRespected.label: Respected
LanguageData.TradingRespected.description: The art of trading is a noble one. We should use it whenever we can.
